Text Editing

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
text-editing:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of text editing, general subclasses, related classes, and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
rdfs:seeAlso
https://digitallatin.github.io/ guidelines/ LDLT-Guidelines.html
dct:title
An ontology about text editing
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

rdfs:Class

text-editing:Edition
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Changed text as a result of editing.
rdfs:isDefinedBy

rdfs:label
edizione testuale (it)
text edition (en)
Text-Edition (de)
édition de texte (fr)
rdfs:subClassOf
text:Text
text-editing:EditorialDirector
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person supervising editors, overseeing one or more editions to be published (e.g. book, magazine, website), ensuring they bear an overarching organization's vision, share certain qualities and assure them.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
editorial director (en)
Redaktionsdirektor (de)
direttore editoriale (it)
directeur éditorial (fr)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://work.chron.com/ editorial-director-21903.html#:~:text=In%20the%20case%20of%20a,and%20authors%20editors%20have%20chosen
rdfs:subClassOf
human:PersonRole

rdfs:Class

creating:PersonCreator
text-editing:Recension
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Critical revision of a text, e.g. a literary classic, i.e. based on a critical examination of earlier texts and authoritative sources, usually undertaken only after a consensus has developed among leading scholars concerning the weight of evidence.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
recension (en)
recensione (it)
Rezension (de)
révision (fr)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis r.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
text-editing:Revision
text-editing:Revision
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Edited text as a result of revising.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
révision de texte (fr)
Textprüfung (de)
revisione del testo (it)
text revision (en)
rdfs:subClassOf
text-editing:Edition
text-editing:Revisor
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person revising a text.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
réviseur de texte (fr)
Text-Revisor (de)
text revisor (en)
revisore del testo (it)
rdfs:subClassOf
text-editing:PersonEditor
text-editing:Transliteration
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Written text transferred in another alphabet using the closest corresponding symbols, e.g. letters.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
transliteration (en)
Transliteration (de)
traslitterazione (it)
translittération (fr)
skos:note
Primarily representing the symbols, not the sounds.
rdfs:subClassOf
text-editing:Edition
text:WrittenText

Properties

text-editing:hasAbbreviator
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating an abbreviation to a person who created it.
rdfs:domain
text-editing:Abbreviation
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
ha abbreviatore (it)
hat Abkurzer (de)
a un abréviateur (fr)
has abbreviator (en)
rdfs:range
rdfs:subClassOf
human:Person
owl:Restriction
owl:onProperty
human:personHasRole
owl:someValuesFrom
text-editing:Abbreviator

a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a text expression to another one derived from it.

text-expression:Expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy

hat abgeleitete Textexpression (de)
rdfs:range
text-editing:DerivedTextExpression
text-editing:hasEdition
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a text to an edition it has.
rdfs:domain
text:Text
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
le texte a une édition (fr)
Text hat Edition (de)
text has edition (en)
il testo ha edizione (it)
rdfs:range
text-editing:Edition
text-editing:hasEditor
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating an edition to the human agent—person or organization—that created it.
rdfs:domain
text-editing:Edition
rdfs:isDefinedBy
text-editing:
rdfs:label
l'édition a un éditeur (fr)

edizione ha editor (it)
rdfs:range
rdfs:subClassOf
human:Agent
owl:Restriction
owl:onProperty
human:agentHasRole
owl:someValuesFrom
